//가이드 영문 텍스트 I downloaded it, but I\'m not sure where to start. What exactly does this app do? What should i do? We have created a guide to help those who are in trouble to use it more smoothly. Use \'hey buddy\' more easier. Shall we start with the feed? 1.Browse the feed and find someone you like. The feed is where you can see photos of others. Look at their photos and find your favorite places, restaurants, events and more. Feeds can be sorted in two ways. The order of the latest and the likes. You can see the feeds sorted according to your choice, and you can move the details of the feeds and move the author\'s profile.
How to use feed 1. Use the buttons at the top to select the sort you want. 2. Click the photo to see the original image. \n If you touch the feed, you can see the entire contents of the feed. 3. If you go to other profile, you can see the feeds that the person has made friends. If you go to your profile, you can see the feeds you liked. Let\'s find a match for you By setting matching conditions, you can find people who meet the conditions. In the Matching Set, set your language, areas of interest, duration of travel, and select the region to visit. When all conditions are selected, click the complete button. Then you can choose users will be displayed. Tap the user and check the feed in their profile. If the feeds are interesting, relatives for more information?" 1. Enter the matching set in the menu and set the matching conditions. 2. Check the users\' profiles in the list and collect the people you want. 3. If the other person accepts the match, exchange messages with the person. Was the guide helpful? you can use it easy. Now try the matching by following the sequence. There will be a good meeting.
